message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a good chunk too.
I'll take a decent share, but you can't have it all!
Let's meet in the middle.  I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I need a better deal than your last offer.
I'll compromise, but I'm not giving up too much more!
Let's split the difference.  I'm feeling the pressure of inflation, so I'm coming down to almost your last offer.  This is the best I can do.
